Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 192nd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Injured on 4/10/2015 with a Stiff Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/2/2015 with a Broken Ulna, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/25/2015 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 6/25/2018 (Going to CIN: SS Clifford Brantner, RF Jc Salomon, P Ronald Diep. Going to STL: P Alfonso Rodriguez, CF Christopher Miller, P Bill Johnson)...
Had first career hit on 9/18/2018, off Bob Largent (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2019, off Demetrio Kabas (CIN)...
Injured on 6/7/2019 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/16/2019 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2021, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,307,143 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Colorado on 5/30/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2022, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2022, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,414,286 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/17/2023 with a Broken Hand, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,414,286 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/5/2025 to a 3-year deal worth $4,375,002 per year...
